attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LGA3Mr8rfIhlSZGI96C_desc
attribs.current: The thri-kreen can change the colour of its carapace to match the colour and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LGA3T-BbRuzhynPqFHl_desc
attribs.current:
The thri-kreen's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). The thri-kreen can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
2/day each: blur, magic weapon
1/day: invisibility (self only)

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGA3kZRlHAfoOPlcwN0_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LGA3kZRlHAfoOPlcwN0_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.

The hand can't attack, activate magical items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGA3m0Bm-Vsg3PLzrgL_spelldescription
attribs.current: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you. For the duration, any creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against you. An attacker is immune to this effect if it doesn't rely on sight, as with blindsight, or can see through illusions, as with truesight.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGA3oxBVRKShnex0slP_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGA3oxBVRKShnex0slP_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bonus increases to +2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bonus increases to +3.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGA3r1ExzDcpHHvhlmH_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: An eyelash encased in gum arabic

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGA3r1ExzDcpHHvhlmH_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LGA3r1ExzDcpHHvhlmH_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LGA43Q-kPsD8Fp7lKD6_desc
attribs.current: If the thri-kreen targets the same creature with all three of its attacks, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against the thri-kreen until the start of the thri-kreen's next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LGA48d1DAhw1bza3MxE_desc
attribs.current: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LGA4DsOV3cZ416YqMm2_description
attribs.current:
The thri-kreen makes three dagger
attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LGA4Jjl26Zjz3R9EVBF_description
attribs.current:
The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw
on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
